title: Microlearning Design and Operational Strategies for Strengthening Mobile-Based Self-Regulated Learning Competencies

context.additional_context: Beginner-level language learning course for professionals (medical, legal, technical) conducted in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can execute self-monitoring techniques to track and evaluate self-regulated learning processes with ≥80% accuracy
Learners can adhere to weekly learning plans at ≥90% compliance using mobile feedback tools (quizzes, progress bars, etc.)
Learners can perform one or more metacognitive reflections and revise learning strategies through asynchronous/synchronous interactions with peers and instructors
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
